resources.string: MAKAUT ORGANIZER contains previous years Semester Exam questions with answers. Organizers doesn\'t contains all the Semester questions. It contains the question and answers of a particular semester. It is like a Holy Book for the students studying in colleges under MAKAUT. If you are thinking to start preparation for Semester Exam just 15 days before the exam then this thing will help you a lot.
